```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

```{r}
here()
```


```{r}
decathlon <- read_rds(here("raw_data/decathlon.rds"))
decathlon
```

```{r}
glimpse(decathlon)
view(decathlon)
```

```{r}
# tidy column names
decathlon_clean <- clean_names(decathlon)
decathlon_clean
```

```{r}
# convert wide data to long data
decathlon_clean <- decathlon_clean %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = "x100m":"x1500m",
               names_to = "event",
               values_to = "result")
decathlon_clean
```
